DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect reference data in patients with haemophilia. The study will also collect and store blood samples for potential future exploratory research in the disease area.
DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study to Collect Data in Patients With Haemophilia
DOC.criteria: Provision of written informed consent Patients with haemophilia, all severities At least 18 years old. No exclusion criteria
